commits.message: efficient batch implementation of stochastic node in autoencoder

efficient batch implementation of stochastic node in autoencoder

pull_request.title: efficient batch implementation of stochastic node in autoencoder
pull_request.body:
Batch implementation of stochastic node (sampling from distribution) for diagonal covariance matrix.
Implemenation for full covariance matrix is remaining (cholesky decomposition).
